sense.def:
Besedo
also
uporabimo, kadar dajemo dodatne podatke o neki osebi ali stvari.

seg.quote: Tony Nuttall is Vice-Chancellor and also a Professor of English at Sussex.

sense.def:
Z besedo
also
lahko tudi povemo, da določen podatek velja še za nekoga ali nekaj drugega.

seg.quote: His first wife was also called Margaret.
